method.id: Retrieve a single Reverse Proxy Instance.
method.doc: To retrieve a single Reverse Proxy Instance with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the API Access Control resource instance URI.
Note that prior to running this web service the Verify Access administrator credential must be stored using the Store the Verify Access administrator credentials web service.
